member.name: T:MainConnectorManhole.Module1
member.summary: This sample creates a sketch tool that creates multiple features in 3D. It demonstrates a line sketch tool, working with 3D geometry, and edit templates.
member.remarks: 1. The data for this sample is available in the CommunitySampleData-3D-05-11-2022.zip download (see link below). After unzipping the content, use the project foudn in this location: c:\Data\MainManhole\MainManhole.ppkx 1. The sample requires a main (line), connector (line) and manhole (point) 3D layers in a scene. You can use the "scene" in this project to run the add-in. 1. The demonstration shows using the sketch to draw on a surface with the resulting features created underneath and connecting. ![UI](Screenshots/Screen.png) 1. The following screenshot is an example of the expected output. ![UI](Screenshots/OutputExample1.png)

member.summary: Called by Framework when ArcGIS Pro is closing
member.returns: False to prevent Pro from closing, otherwise True
